mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NO_CODE, USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEW_COUNT, C_DT, UP_DT ) VALUES ( NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{viewCount}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY NO_CODE DESC) AS rnum, NO_CODE, USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEW_COUNT, C_DT, UP_DT FROM NOTICE WHERE ( (#{searchDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '10' AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchWord, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') OR (#{searchDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '20' AND CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchWord, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') OR (#{searchDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '30' AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchWord, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') OR #{searchDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '' ) ) WHERE rnum > (#{pageNo} - 1) * #{pageSize} AND rnum <= #{pageNo} * #{pageSize}
SELECT NO_CODE, USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEW_COUNT, C_DT, UP_DT FROM NOTICE WHERE NO_CODE = #{noCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, UP_DT = SYSDATE WHERE NO_CODE = #{noCode}
